item.description:
Relax and unwind while enjoying some great music and great company of other singles in their 40's and 50's.

Little Mahrud Jazz Orchestra
Cool Jazz on a hot summer evening.

Bring a chair.
Food and beverages are available for sale.

Try to arrive around 6 pm so we have time to talk and socialize before the music starts at 6:30 pm.

Look for Jacki in the purple chair and foot stand. Can't find her, call her cell: 508-381-1529

If it rains it's cancelled.

Please only RSVP - YES
If you do not plan on attending, no need to RSVP.
item.name: Early Evening Outdoor Jazz Concert - Milford
